Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Note: "patients with HIV undergoing indinavir therapy" implies that the nonopaque crystal deposition is a disease or condition related to HIV patients taking indinavir therapy. Therefore, it is included as a single disease entity.
